name: In The Garden - An Arrietty's Fangame
name_original: In The Garden - An Arrietty's Fangame
description:
Your name is Arrietty, and you are a Borrower girl, a minuscule girl who lives among the humans. You will have to avoid the bugs on your path, and find all the berries hidden among the grass path. But at the end of the garden, there is a certain boy you have to find, whatever it takes...

This project was made as an assignment with the creative requirement to take a movie extract and to turn it into a game. I chose "Arrietty The Borrower" as it is one of my favorite ghibli movies and I wished to work with its setting.

  • Art, Animation and Game Design: by My-Loan
  • Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5
  • Background Music Made by: Studio Megaane (youtube channel link here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL6B3WVcVHJvU2YSF-i-oUg

All rights belong to their respective owners.
